title: Simple Roasted Butternut Squash
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
method: Step 1: Gather all ingredients. Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
Step 2: Peel butternut squash with a sharp vegetable peeler. Cut in half lengthwise; scoop out and discard seeds.
Step 3: Cut halves into 1-inch slices, then cut slices into 1-inch cubes.
Step 4: Combine butternut squash cubes, olive oil, and garlic in a large bowl and toss until well coated. Season with salt and pepper.
Step 5: Arrange in a single layer on a baking sheet.
Step 6: Roast in the preheated oven until squash is lightly browned and tender when pierced with a fork, 25 to 35 minutes.
